name: BroSpace_Defense_Force
description:
Brospace Defense force is a shoot-em-up prototype written in javascript / html5,

Works best on a 16/9 screen with a 60hz refresh.

Controls:

Move => Z, Q, S, D

Shoot => left mouse button

Bomb => space.

Most of the graphics come from https://opengameart.org/content/super-dead-space-gunner-merc-redux-platform-shmup-hero
